text: John Dall (born John Jenner Thompson, May 26, 1918 - January 15, 1971) was an American actor. He was born in New York City. He starred in Rope with Farley Granger and James Stewart. Dall played the male lead role in Gun Crazy. Dall died of a heart attack in Beverly Hills, California.MSN == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1918 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: John Dall
